title: iShares Bitcoin Trust (NASDAQ:IBIT) Sees Significant Increase in Short Interest
description: iShares Bitcoin Trust (NASDAQ:IBIT - Get Free Report) was the target of a large increase in short interest in the month of March. As of March 15th, there was short interest totalling 9,170,000 shares, an increase of 53.1% from the February 28th total of 5,990,000 shares. Currently, 1.4% of the shares of the stock are sold short. Based on an average daily volume of 45,809,700 shares, the days-to-cover ratio is currently 0.2 days.

title: Ripple to face intense competition from emerging Altcoin Mutuum Finance (MUTM) in 2025, and a top XRP holder worries MUTM will win
description: Ripple (XRP) has long been a dominant player in the crypto market, especially with its strong institutional backing and role in cross-border payments. However, as 2025 approaches, a new challenger, MUTM stands as a platform that is rapidly capturing attention among top XRP holders and it creates anxiety in this group. title: Sen. David McCormick Purchases Shares of Bitwise Bitcoin ETF (NYSEARCA:BITB)
description: Senator David McCormick (R-Pennsylvania) recently bought shares of Bitwise Bitcoin ETF (NYSEARCA:BITB).
